attributes.action: Bring in a national system of road tolls and invest the proceeds in public transport and 'green' projects
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Car emissions represent a significant proportion of carbon emissions and other types of pollution in the UK each year. 
Reducing the number of cars on the roads is the best way of reducing this pollution. Introducing road pricing schemes across the country will encourage people to think about using alternative means of transport. By investing any revenue generated in public transport infrastructure and to counter the damage done by car emissions direct benefits to all can be provided.
